name: TrickOrTreat
0:
”Alexa, Start Trick OR Treat”
”Tell me a random Halloween recipe”
”Say one more”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trick or treat
des: A fun Halloween party starter skill which gives great random ideas for Halloween snacks. It will randomly select new ideas for making Halloween more spooky and special!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
